# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #144](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#144)

#### Zenith

Is Szeth bound to his Oathstone by anything but honor (not the shard. No loopholes here )?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO
